entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
